All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppController
Handles control of the main menu flow: create from file/URL or exit.
AppInterface
Displays output to the console.
ConsoleColour
Ascii codes to format console output.
FileIO
Handles all file related input/output and validation tasks.
IgnoreWords
Handles reading, parsing and loading the ignorewords.txt file into a Set.
ImageDisplay
A Java class to demonstrate how to load an image from disk with the ImageIO class.
InputProcesser
Handles input from the source.
IOator
Ensures that all implementing classes check that the source is validated and use a Scanner to get input from the source
Patterns
Declare's common patterns that may be matched in content
Runner
Launches the Word Cloud Generator.
ScriptParsator
Role of ScriptParsator is to remove HTML and Script tags including metadata from a String plus the functionality it inherits from WordParsator.
Sources
The word cloud sources: File or URL
URLIO
Validates and Scans input a URL source
WCImageMaker
Makes a Word Cloud and saves as an PNG image in location requested.
WordCloud
Handles Word Cloud related tasks; such getting and setting data required for the word cloud.
WordParsator
Role of WordParser - is to ensure text stored in a string is cleaned up of non word text\symbols and the text is split into an array of strings
